# LinearPCMFormatFlagIsNonMixable

**Enumeration Case**

A flag to indicate whether the PCM format can’t mix.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCMFormatFlagIsNonMixable
```

## Discussion

This flag is a synonym of [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsNonMixable].

## Mixability Flags

- **FormatFlagIsNonMixable**: A flag to indicate whether the format can’t mix.
